content:
I just released wasi-sdk-21 with all of the latest changes in wasi-sdk and wasi-libc: https://github.com/WebAssembly/wasi-sdk/releases/tag/wasi-sdk-21. It is still marked as a pre-release; let me know if you run into any issues with it.

Release wasi-sdk-21 · WebAssembly/wasi-sdk
This release updates LLVM to v17 (#362) and adds shared library support (#338). It also includes various smaller fixes to wasi-libc, CMake files, and the project's build scripts. What's Changed Pa...
